author: Harry Craddock
description: In his 1948 The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks, David Embury says of the Alaska, "This is also sometimes called the Oriental. It can be greatly improved by using less Chartreuse and adding 1 or 2 parts dry sherry. This is the Nome."
name: Alaska (Savoy recipe)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
